original_title: Pinned to the Rail: 10 Days Off of Cabo San Lucas
overview: Packed with rod-bending action, tips, techniques and amazing underwater coverage this film takes you on a 10-day journey with Owner/Operator, Tommy Rothery onboard the 90-foot Polaris Supreme to fish the rich waters off of the coast of the Baja Peninsula in search of wahoo, yellowtail, dorado and cow yellowfin tuna.
title: Pinned to the Rail: 10 Days Off of Cabo San Lucas
